I have found the focus program for adults works for me. I only attend once a week but with my schedule it works great. The staff is truly understanding and helpful.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students Northwestern is great for any students that knows that continuing their education is extremely important in finding a secure job. It is also a wonderful place to start a relationship with the Lord, or continue to feed one that has already been started, perhaps for many years prior. Northwestern also has some rules that are important for the students to follow. A prospective students should expect some code of conduct that is expected of the students at Northwestern. These rules are not enforced for the school's benefit, but rather for the student's benefit, therefore, the rules become foundations for a better future. Any student looking to grow immensely in the Lord along with continuing their education for the future would thrive at Northwestern College. Tips for prospective students I was looking for a college that not only would challenge me academically and help me find a career that would fit, but also one that would challenge me spiritually and help me grow in my relationship with the Lord. Northwestern was a perfect fit. Here, I am daily challenged in my walk with the Lord as well as my career path. Although times are tough and earning money is becoming more and more difficult, I think it is of the highest importance to consider Northwestern not only as a key to finding a good
